com.esri.mo2.data.feat
Interface Fields

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseFields
public interface Fields
extends Cloneable

Implements a collection of Field objects.

See Also:
Field, Table, Row

               throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException

Returns:

findField

public int findField(String name)
Returns the index associated with the given Field's name. Normally, this will be a case-independent search.

Returns:
the index of the Field found, or -1, if not found

findField

public int findField(Field f)
Returns the index of a Field that is equal to the specified Field. All properties of the Field objects are expected to be equal.

Parameters:
f - the Field
Returns:
the index of the Field found, or -1, if not found

getFields

public Field[] getFields()
Returns all Fields into an array of Field objects.

Returns:
an array of Fields, or null if getNumFields() == zero
